title: Has someone proven that traditional Chinese medicine doesn't work?
description: Answer (1 of 9): Now, when I decide to answer this question, there are 2 books about traditional Chinese medicine lying on my table. I read them about 2 days ago. And after reading them. I'm more certain of what I thought. That is most traditional Chinese medicine may doesn't work. If they work...
